select ROWNUM, A.* from ( select * from board where b_id=#{b_id} order by b_regdate DESC )A
where rownum < 7

select ROWNUM, A.* from ( select * from ticketView where mem_id=#{mem_id} and r_checkpay='Y' and s_startTime >= SYSDATE order by s_starttime )A
where rownum < 7

select count(*) from ticketView
and r_checkpay='Y' and s_startTime >= SYSDATE

select count(*) from ticketView
and r_checkpay='Y' and s_startTime < SYSDATE
